title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce application using React.js and Spring Boot.
details: Features user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and uses MySQL for database management.

title: School Website
description: A React-based website for a school.
details: A responsive website designed for a school, built using React.js, featuring a student portal, gallery section, and Google Maps integration.

title: Expense Tracker
description: A personal finance tracker built with React.
details: A personal finance application allowing users to monitor income and expenses with an intuitive dashboard.
